backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling access control, user approvals, and registration for client, partner, and internal roles with ID generation and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend modifications and sanity checks for the Superadmin dashboard along with related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-computed summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend pages including dashboards, auth screens, and internal flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manual router component mapping URL paths to corresponding pages including dashboards, external auth pages, and internal flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, persistence, and delegated identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook using the actor to check task creation permissions, currently returning a static false value.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/_shared/PageShell.tsx: Provides a shared page wrapper with a gradient background, centered content, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled login options and links to registration or back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form UI with disabled submission and several input fields.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing a simple static message with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Dashboard for Asistenmu role displaying a thank‑you message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard showing task creation button controlled by query state.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard with a gratitude message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard showing a finance‑themed status message with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard presenting a motivational message with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Large superadmin UI managing tabs for summaries, users, master data, and configurations with extensive state management.
Handles Internet Identity login for clients and routes them to registration or dashboard based on backend user lookup.
frontend/src/pages/external/ClientRegist: Provides client registration with form validation and backend submission, then redirects to dashboard after success.
frontend/src/pages/external/PartnerLogin: Handles Internet Identity login for partners and routes them to registration or dashboard based on backend user lookup.
frontend/src/pages/external/PartnerRegis: Provides partner registration with form validation and backend submission, then redirects to dashboard after success.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Simple landing page offering links to internal login and registration.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Manages internal user authentication, role extraction, superadmin claim checks, and routing to appropriate dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Registration page for internal users with login, role selection, and form submission using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering client and partner login/registration links with styled layout.
Static partner login page with disabled login buttons and links to registration and home.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Static partner registration form with disabled submit button and basic input fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing version, constraints, requirements, and known issues for backend and frontend development.
